title: IAA Tonight | Is Bill Belichick Still the Greatest Coach of All Time? AND Are the Lakers In Trouble?
description: Coming off a bad Monday Night Football loss to the Chicago Bears at home, the New England Patriots now find themselves in a QB conundrum after benching 2021 first-round pick Mac Jones in favor of 2022 fourth-round pick Bailey Zappe. LeSean McCoy, Adam Pacman Jones, and Leger Douzable discuss the Patriots QB woes, and the status Bill Belichick in the pantheon of great coaches. Plus, should LeBron and the Lakers be panicking just three games into the season?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, LeSean McCoy, Adam Pacman Jones)
